name: Perfectly Balanced (Game Jam 2021)
description:
There are many coding bugs; in fact, most of them I put there on purpose

If you happen to be recording this, or if you are a Nintendo employee, please press the C button on your keyboard.  I do not claim to own any of the music in this and I am not making money off of this which I think is fair use

It might take a sparrow's attention span to load, so shop for a better gaming PC while it takes 4-10 seconds.  I know, a sparrow's attention span is daunting, but I believe in you!

After letting people playtest this, it seems that the directions are unclear/vague at times.  This is 100% intellectual puzzle gameplay at its finest.  Don't take too long to actually attack or you will get bugged on >:)
